argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | eqeq12i.1 | |- A = B |
| 2 |  | eqeq12i.2 | |- C = D |
| 3 |  | #P_eqeq12 | |- ( ( A = B /\ C = D ) -> ( A = C <-> B = D ) ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_mp2an | |- ( A = C <-> B = D ) |
\
 Obsolete proof of ~ eqeq12i as of 20-Nov-2019.  (Contributed by NM, 15-Jul-1993.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 25-May-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
